channel.title: Client error
channel.description: k so my client runs on my computer but when i send it to a friend or they download it form one of my links they cant run it they get a retrying in 10 seconds thing and i need help fixing that if anyones got team viewer i will pay 5$ if u can fix it cause this is the only thing stopping me from releasing my source i made.
